title: Oasis
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Portuguese
description: Restaurante vegetariano opposite Gulbenkian Gardens. Offers a rotating menu of around 4 dishes each day, served with rice and side salad; choose from one, two, or three of these dishes - usually one or two are vegan. Fresh carrot, apple and orange juices. Vegan Alpro desserts. Has Wi-Fi. Russian spoken.
streetAddress: Rua Marques de Sa da Bandeira 76
